unnormalised: Hey Car Peeps! Big week for new rides!
normalised: Hey Car Peeps! Big week for new rides!

unnormalised: First off, Mahindra finally dropped the Bolero Neo Plus in the market. Initial reports are saying it's a beast! Perfect for those bumpy roads in UP, right?
normalised: First off, Mahindra finally dropped the Bolero Neo Plus in the market. Initial reports are saying it's a beast! Perfect for those bumpy roads in U P, right?

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors unveiled a concept SUV, the 'Nexon Varun', at the Auto Expo in Pune. Dr. Sharma from ARAI was seen checking it out closely. Rumors are it'll have a crazy good mileage.
normalised: Then, Tata Motors unveiled a concept S U V, the 'Nexon Varun', at the Auto Expo in Pune. Doctor Sharma from A R A I was seen checking it out closely. Rumors are it'll have a crazy good mileage.

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki launched a special edition WagonR, the 'Festival Edition', just in time for Diwali! Expect jazzy colours and some bling. Dealers are already seeing long queues!
normalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki launched a special edition Wagon R, the 'Festival Edition', just in time for Diwali! Expect jazzy colours and some bling. Dealers are already seeing long queues!

unnormalised: Speaking of Diwali, remember to drive safe, y'all!
normalised: Speaking of Diwali, remember to drive safe, y'all!

unnormalised: Also, that electric scooter from Ather Energy got a price cut! Now available for around Rs. 1.2 Lakh ex-showroom Bangalore. Good for zipping around in traffic.
normalised: Also, that electric scooter from Ather Energy got a price cut! Now available for around rupee one point two lakh ex-showroom Bangalore. Good for zipping around in traffic.

unnormalised: And lastly, news from IIT Madras is that they're developing a new kind of battery that lasts longer! Could be a game-changer. They said prototype plant will need around 5000 sq ft to setup. Watch this space!
normalised: And lastly, news from I I T Madras is that they're developing a new kind of battery that lasts longer! Could be a game-changer. They said prototype plant will need around five thousand square feet to setup. Watch this space!
